career.name: Finlit
description: Led a 4-person Agile team using FastAPI and SQLAlchemy to design and implement core RESTful APIs for application services
Performed endpoint testing in Insomnia to detect and resolve API logic errors, reducing overall backend errors by ∼12%
Containerized backend with Docker and implemented CI/CD, standardizing environments and reducing team setup time by ∼35%
Optimized PostgreSQL queries by implementing pagination with SQLAlchemy, reducing data request load times by ∼15%

career.name: Villanova University
description: Collaborated with the Pittsburgh Pirates on computer vision research for pitcher arm angles, achieving ∼90% model accuracy
Applied ViTPose object detection to pitching footage, estimating arm angles with a mean absolute error of 5.5° across 60+ frames

career.name: SEO (Sponsors for Educational Opportunity
description: Led a 3-person full-stack development team as project lead and Scrum Master, guiding development from inception to deployment
Developed an award-winning project, securing Best UX and tying for Best Overall among 28 competing teams
Designed prompt engineering strategies for Google Gemini (Generative Language API), enhancing response accuracy by 20%
Implemented Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), resulting in ~16% more accurate and contextually relevant responses
Completed 300+ hours of software engineering training focused on data structures, algorithms, and full-stack web development

career.name: Optima
description: Developed Flask backend in collaboration with 3+ developers, enabling seamless Google Firebase integration for 3000+ users
Optimized API calls, resulting in a ~30% increase to data retrieval speed and a reduction in errors by ~20%
